name: Mini Veggie Puff Pizzas

ingredients.name: mix of red pepper, grated carrots, and green onion

preparation:
1. Preheat oven to 425° F (220° C).
  2. Heat a frying pan over medium heat, and add oil and veggies. Sauté for 1 minute. Stir in Asian Stir-Fry Seasoning, Salt and Pepper. Set aside.
  3. In a small bowl, combine Cream Ranch Dip Mix and cream cheese until easy to spread.
  4. On a Sheet Pan Liner, roll puff pastry into a 10.5” square. Gently flip onto an appy maker. Using a rolling pin, firmly roll over to cut pastry.
  5. Spread triangles with cream cheese mixture: 1⁄2 tsp for small, 1–2 tsp for large.
  6. Place on a Sheet Pan lined with a Sheet Pan Liner. Top with veggies, and bake until pastry puffs: approximately 10–11 minutes for small, 12–14 minutes for large.
